text:
It would appear that the <mime-mapping> directives in conf/web.xml no longer have any effect. I am trying to add a mime type for serving WML pages but the new entry is ignored and every page is returned with a MIME type of text/plain. Phone emulators don't like this.

All works as expected in Tomcat 3.1.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
The system-wide conf/web.xml file is no longer used in Tomcat 3.2.  Use 
<webapp>/WEB-INF/web.xml

creator: nacho@apache.org
